items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving it!
items.body: Comfortable material! Fits perfectly and even has a little stretch to it. Flowing style at the bottom perfect for putting and church events. Cute tea party style dress. The quality is amazing! Read more
items.author: Kay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute, high-quality dress!
items.body: I love this dress! I got the green color to wear to a Christmas party and it is SO CUTE! It is true to size, I am 5'5", 145 lbs, and ordered a medium. I wanted it to "fit", and it's perfect! The fabric is high quality and It is perfect with my red cowboy boots!! Read more
items.author: Sandra L. Crinkelmeyer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for photoshoots and special occasions
items.body: I ordered this is XXL and XL and opened the XL to try on first due to some reviews saying it runs a bit big. I'm usually an XXL and the XL fit perfectly. It still had slightly loose areas but after washing and drying, it shrunk a bit and was perfect. It's extremely comfortable and will be warm in it (or hot if you run hot like I do, lol). The color was beautiful and was absolutely perfect to wear for our family photos. I received so many compliments from family when trying it on and from strangers during our shoot. It looks darker in my photo due to the edit done on it. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Kiara Tanori

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: The dress is very pretty.the material is really good too. This dress just wasn’t for my body type Read more
items.author: Kayly M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit. Great price!
items.body: This is a well-fitted, comfortable knit dress. Very flattering and makes a modest silhouette. The material is a good weight and thickness for yearound wear. The price is quite affordable. I definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: WRM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this dress!
items.body: It is amazing, heavy, sweater material. Fits perfectly, so comfortable. I can’t say enough good things. I bought for a wedding on 11/30 and have already worn 2x since! Read more
items.author: Jon Martinez

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but needs a Slip
items.body: Fits true to size. But it’s pretty sheer and definitely needs a slip if you want it to be modest. Read more
items.author: JS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable
items.body: This is a super cute dress with a beautiful color and it is very comfortable. Fits great! Read more
items.author: G. Colburn

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Burgundy, Grey Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Light Blue, Khaki, Pink, White, Grey Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
